tone_framing: Frame the tour as a treasure hunt
key_takeaways: Silk was a symbol of power and wealth in Chinese history.
Innovative techniques in porcelain production were central to cultural exchange.
The Tang dynasty marked a key era for the development of art and trade.
creative_activities: Design your own robe using symbolic colors and patterns inspired by Chinese porcelain motifs.
Create a mini 'treasure map' connecting key objects in the exhibit to historical trade routes.
Host a short quiz where students match porcelain techniques or patterns to their historical origins.
